resource.chars:
to shew the sort of grounds upon which the 
Author attempts to upset the wellbased 
Conclusions of numerous competent 
observers who have shown beyond all reasonable doubt that the Cysticercus 
cellulosae is nothing more than the Scolex form 
of <u>Taenia solium <\u>, from whose ova 
it is derived originally in the form of 
a minute mobile vesicular body furnished with 
6 hooklets, by which it is enabled to make 
its way through the soft tissues of the 
Animal body & probably therefore <s>into is 
enabled <\s> in some cases to enter the current 
of the circulation, & to be thus assisted in its 
dispersion throughout the frame. The subsequent 
transformation of this 6 hooked embryo 
into the true scolex of the Taenia, the Cysticercus 
cellulosae
